section.para: Deletes a value from the AstDB. Upon completion, the variable DB_RESULT is set to this value, if it exists.; delete cidnums/4045559814: exten => 123,1,Set(ignored=${DB_DELETE(cidnums/4045559814)})

note.simpara: For versions prior to Asterisk 1.4, use the application DBdel().

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'DB_DELETE' =-
[Syntax] DB_DELETE(<family>/<key>)
[Synopsis] Return a value from the database and delete it
[Description] This function will retrieve a value from the Asterisk database and then remove that key from the database. DB_RESULT will be set to the key's value if it exists.

formalpara.title: diff output to internal help in Asterisk 1.2:
